meta.name: description
meta.content: White Salmon Valley School District serves students from Kindergarten through grade 12, and is located in White Salmon, WA.

header.h2: Update: Extended Meal Program through June 19

div.p:
No charge to children 18 and under.
Updated April 21, 2020

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2560px; height: 870px;

Students on a field trip among the trees
Smiling girls in the volleyball stands
Students working together on an assignment
Students showing off their research projects on animals
Sophomores show off their yellow on Color War Day during Homecoming
A student plays the trombone at Henkle Middle School
A young student works with a volunteer
Freshmen show off their Orange during Color War Day
A sunny day at Columbia High School, seen through the snow

div.div: White Salmon Valley School District provides a safe environment where each student is encouraged to dream, is inspired to succeed, and is empowered to become a life-long learner.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 338px; height: 174px;
